title: Regulators close Signature Bank, second shuttered.
content: Financial regulators have closed Signature Bank, marking the second major bank shutdown this year amid economic instability.
author: McKindney

title: Killing of teacher and Hamas assault set a jittery France.
content: A tragic incident involving a teacher and a Hamas assault has left France on edge, raising security concerns.
author: McKindney

title: IPL Auction 2024, everything you need to know.
content: The IPL Auction 2024 is set to bring exciting bids and surprises for cricket fans worldwide.
author: Sports Guru
